sentences.en: A whale is a fish. True or false?
sentences.cn: 鲸鱼是鱼，对还是错？

sentences.en: A whale is a kind of mammal.
sentences.cn: 鲸是一种哺乳动物.

sentences.en: I had a whale of a time in Birmingham.
sentences.cn: 我在伯明翰度过了一段非常快乐的时光。

sentences.en: If you don't eat less, you'll end up looking like a whale!
sentences.cn: 如果你不少吃些, 你最终会使自己看起来像一条鲸鱼!

sentences.en: Norwegian whalers said yesterday they had harpooned a female minke whale.
sentences.cn: 挪威的捕鲸人说昨天他们用捕鲸叉捕获了一头雌性小须鲸。

sentences.en: So whale come out fish, because they are fish obviously.
sentences.cn: 所以鲸鱼就是鱼，因为他们显然是鱼。

sentences.en: The blue whale is the largest living thing on the planet.
sentences.cn: 蓝鲸是地球上体型最大的生物。

sentences.en: The blue whale is the world's largest living animal.
sentences.cn: 蓝鲸是世界上最大的动物.

sentences.en: The harpoon drove deep into the body of the whale.
sentences.cn: 渔叉深深地扎进鲸鱼体内.

sentences.en: The receding tide stranded the whale.
sentences.cn: 退潮把鲸鱼搁浅在海滩上。

sentences.en: The whale expelled water from his blowhole.
sentences.cn: 鲸鱼从鼻孔排出水.

sentences.en: The whale is rich in blubber.
sentences.cn: 这种鲸油多.

sentences.en: The whale is the largest mammal in creation.
sentences.cn: 鲸鱼是所有哺乳动物中最大的.

sentences.en: The whale nearest to the photographer is releasing air to aid its descent.
sentences.cn: 这只离摄影师最近的白鲸正呼出空气以帮助其下潜。

sentences.en: The whale thrashed the water with its tail.
sentences.cn: 鲸鱼用尾巴猛烈地打水.

sentences.en: They do not have a set migration pattern, unlike some other whale species - which raises questions about how they may adapt in future, if the projected declines in summer Arctic sea ice materialise.
sentences.cn: 它们没有一套迁徙的模式，不像其他的鲸类――假如夏季北极海冰像预计那样减少而成为现实的话，这就引起了关于它们如何适应未来的问题。

sentences.en: They had a whale of a good time.
sentences.cn: 他们玩得很尽兴.

sentences.en: They had a whale of a time at the funfair.
sentences.cn: 他们在游乐场玩得很开心.

sentences.en: This sense of revelation is in part due to our changing attitude towards the whale.
sentences.cn: 与鲸鱼感到关联部分是由于和我们对鲸鱼态度发生了变化。

sentences.en: This type of whale is notable for its elongated beak. It dives deeper than 500 metres for food.
sentences.cn: 这种鲸因其瘦长的喙而闻名。它能够潜入深度超过500米的海中寻找食物。

sentences.en: Throw out a minnow to catch a whale.
sentences.cn: 弃小引大.

sentences.en: you've been doing a whale of a job.
sentences.cn: 你一直工作得很不错。

phrases.tran_cn: [美国口语]了不起的，非常大的，极大的；极好的，精彩的

phrases.phrase: have a whale of a time

phrases.tran_cn: 巨头鲸；抹香鲸（等于Physeter catodon）

trans.tran_en: a very large animal that lives in the sea and looks like a fish, but is actually a mammal
